title: P2P Order Information (request)
description: Retrieves the information about a P2P order.

id.description: The unique identifier for the order.

subscribe.description: [Optional] If set to 1, will send updates whenever there is an update to order

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
